mapper.insert: insert into va_cust_virtual_acct_bal_day select cust_virid,vir_acct_type,cust_id,#{run_date},actural_bal,usable_bal,freeze_bal,recharge_bal from va_cust_virtual_acct_bal
insert into va_cust_merch_acct_bal_day select merch_virid,vir_acct_type,merch_id,#{run_date},actural_bal,usable_bal,freeze_bal,recharge_bal from va_merch_virtual_acct_bal
